summary:
This MOD will add a futanari races.
You can Toggle the CBBEv3 / UNP body type.
descriptionHtml:
This MOD will add a futanari races.
  And You can Toggle the CBBEv3 / UNP body type.
  - Imperial / Breton / Nord / Redguard / Khajiit
  - DarkElf / HighElf / WoodElf / Orc   (Female Only)
  - - You can trans at the spells(Power). Don\'t show in showracemenu.
  - - P is added to new body parts.

[size=+1] 2012/08/16  Release - Futanarium equippable addon. [/size]

+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
[size=+1][b][color=#ffffff]Latest Update[/color][/b][/size]
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

  V1.2 2012/03/09
  - TransFutaRace changed to dialog. and Integration with TransBody.

  - BugFix
  - - Imperial UNP issue.
  - - NPC\'s Vampire is not applicable.

  - Include Racial Compatibility v1.7


+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
[size=+1][b][color=#ffffff]Install / How to use[/color][/b][/size]
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

  Use Nexus Mod Manager.
  Download and install as you would any other NMM mod.

  When you begin a game, you get some spells.

  - [Spell(Power)]
  - Trans Futa Race / Trans Futa Race Other
  - - Change Vanilla Race <-> Futa Race(CBBE/UNP)

  When you cast the spells, you get some outfits.

  - [Outfit]
  - Magical Bandaid(CBBE) / Magical Bandaid(UNP) / MagicalBandaid (Khajiit)
  - - Please use when equip a vanilla outfits, not support P outfits, etc.
  - - Each, for CBBE / UNP.

  - Add Balls(CBBE) / Add Balls(UNP) / Add Balls(Khajiit)
  - - This is Replace a penis with balls type.

  - Lace Accessory(White) / Lace Accessory(Pink) / Lace Accessory(Black)
  - - Accessory for P :)

  First initializing, It may need twenty, thirty seconds.

  ! If you are using a v0.5 savedata, 
  ! First, Keep v0.5, Do it.
  ! - Unequip Trans Futa Spells.
  ! - Do setracemenu, choise vanilla race, edit face. (Regenerate face by this)

+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
[size=+1][b][color=#ffffff]BodySlide[/color][/b][/size]
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

  Supported BodySlide V1-0-1(*1)
  Add presets for new race.

  (1) Exec skyrim/data/CalienteTools/BodySlide/BodySlide.exe
  (2) Select Outfit/Body:
      FutanariumCBBE: Nude
      FutanariumBBP : Nude BBP (*2)

  (3) Select Preset or Customize slider.

  (4) Click -Create Bodies- button, Probably it\'s applied in game.

  *1 NMM install Calientes BodySlide v1-0-1 in CBBEv3 page. (OPTIONAL FILES section)
  *2 Require Breast and Butt Physics mod. Please replace following file.
     /Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets futanarium/cbbe/skeleton_female.nif


+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
[size=+1][b][color=#ffffff]Added files[/color][/b][/size]
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

  Meshes for Futa race
    /data/meshes/actor/charctor asset futanarium

  Textures for Futa race
    /data/textures/actor/character/futanarium

  Body data is used those files.
  Face and hair data is used vanilla files.

  If you want to equip BBP outfit. Please replace following file to CHSBHC\'s those.
    /data/meshes/actor/charctor asset futanarium/cbbe/skeleton_female.nif
    /data/meshes/actor/charctor asset futanarium/unp/skeleton_female.nif
    /data/meshes/actor/charctor asset futanarium/khajiit/skeletonbeast_female.nif


+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
[size=+1][b][color=#ffffff]Changelog[/color][/b][/size]
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

  V1.1 2012/03/04
  - Fixed some issues of Khajiit
  - - tail gone
  - - dont applay P size
  - Added Lace Accessory(Black)
  - Adjusted InitQuest
  - Include Racial Compatibility v1.6

  V1.0 2012/03/03
  - Support Khajiit(She has only CBBE body type. Can\'t use TransBody.)
  - Support customized skeleton.nif (skeleton_female.nif)
  - Japanese version available.
  - Bug fix.

  V0.9 2012/02/26
  - Include Generic RaceController v1.3
  - Include Racial Compatibility v1.4
  - - Support Vampire, etc quest, item.
  - - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10165

  V0.8 2012/02/26
  - Added \"Add Balls\" This is replace a penis with balls type.
  - - Added automatically it when use Trans Spells.

  V0.7 2012/02/25
  - Added races.
  - - DarkElf / HighElf / WoodElf / Orc

  - Adjusted futa spells.
  - - Fx, etc.

  V0.6.1 2012/02/25
  - I\'ve been forgot to replace the UNPv1.3 texture.

  V0.6 2012/02/24
  - Incruse compatibility for vanilla races.
  - - No longer don\'t erase your head.
  - - Hair add mods support.
  - - You can FutaTrans only at the spells. (Dont show in showracemenu)

  - Separate FutaTrans spells.
  - - Trans Futa Race (Vanilla Race <-> Futa Race)
  - - Trans Futa Body (CBBE body <-> UNP body)
  - - Became voiceequip.

  V0.5  2012/02/22
  - First release (WIP)

  The forerunner : ACBBE [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8864]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8864[/url]


+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
[size=+1][b][color=#ffffff]Known issues / Work plan etc...[/color][/b][/size]
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

  Npc change have some issues.
  Tentative solution - Exec \"setnpcweight 0\" to NPC. 
  We might have to wait to official bug fix. 

  Argonian...? 
  yeah, I\'m clearly remember her :3 maybe..

  More comment is in Japanese readme.txt :)


+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
[size=+1][b][color=#ffffff]Contact[/color][/b][/size]
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

  nihongo de ok!


+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
[size=+1][b][color=#ffffff]Credits & Thanks[/color][/b][/size]
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Thanks to original mod authors!

-Body-
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666[/url]

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709[/url]
FemFeet by Phygit
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666[/url]

Kisa Khajiit nude fur textures by KisaFayd
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4962]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4962[/url]

-Based Penis-
Big Futanari Shemale Mod by futamagus
[url=http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=32113]http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=32113[/url]
# modify mesh & texture by otmotm

-Bandaid-
Triangle Bandaid -UNP- by anano
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3496215]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3496215[/url]

-Fix-
Creating a Playable Race - The right way by Expired
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10165]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10165[/url]
